about_the_game:
The fan pack for "Jellyfish Season".


9 audio tracks, 6 background images and 6 character sprites.

After purchasing and downloading the Jellyfish Season Fan Pack you can find these files inside "Jellyfish Season" game directory.

Track list:


01 Jellyfish Season.mp3
02 Deserted Beach.mp3
03 She Came From The Air.mp3
04 Ghost Poet.mp3
05 It's A Pity.mp3
06 Eye In The Navel.mp3
07 Silent Bell.mp3
08 Interlude.mp3
09 Wood Carving.mp3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 58 MB available space

short_description: Includes official soundtrack, background images and sprites.
